text: Kenny Griffin (January 27, 1912 - September 26, 2002) was an American gymnast. He competed in eight events at the 1936 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:2002 deaths Category:American male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of the United States Category:Gymnasts at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Logan, Utah
title: Kenny Griffin
